about.title: Words About Us
about.description: A group of companies operating in several sectors, including real estate investment, gold investment, the Egyptian stock exchange and securities trading, as well as training and qualifying individuals in business, marketing, and technology.

investments.subtitle: INVESTMENT OFFER
investments.title: Our Investment Plans
investments.quote: Don't miss out on something interesting today just because you think you'll find something better tomorrow.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Starter investment package for beginners in USD.

infinity.name: Infinity
infinity.description: Conservative portfolio emphasizing capital preservation and steady income through government bonds and blue-chip dividends.

silver.name: Silver
silver.description: A balanced investment package offering stable monthly returns, suitable for investors seeking moderate growth with controlled risk.

gold.name: Gold
gold.description: A growth-oriented investment package ideal for investors aiming to expand their capital through consistent monthly returns and diversified strategies.

platinum.name: Platinum
platinum.description: A premium investment package tailored for experienced investors looking for higher returns through advanced market strategies and disciplined risk management.

diamond.name: Diamond
diamond.description: A high-tier investment package designed for serious investors who seek strong performance, capital growth, and professionally managed investment forecasting.

honestEgy.name: Honest Egy
honestEgy.description: An exclusive elite investment package offering maximum potential returns, designed for high-value investors who demand strategic forecasting, stability, and long-term growth.

footer.companyDescription: Start your investment and trading journey with Honest EG Group of Companies

location.title: Location
location.cairo: Al-Mokattam, Middle Plateau 99, Al-Zuhour District - Cairo

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a leading company in the field of investment and development in Egypt by providing innovative and comprehensive solutions across the sectors of industry, agriculture, real estate, and stock markets. We aim to build an integrated economic ecosystem that supports entrepreneurs and investors, with a strong focus on education and training as essential tools for achieving success and financial sustainability

realEstate.title: Real Estate Investment
realEstate.description: Developing, selling, and leasing residential and commercial properties, while providing reliable solutions that enhance asset value and support the needs of the real estate market.

training.title: Training & Qualification
training.description: Empowering individuals and organizations with comprehensive training programs in business management, leadership, and professional development to drive growth and excellence.

stockExchange.title: The Egyptian Stock Exchange
stockExchange.description: Providing expert guidance and strategic insights for navigating the Egyptian Stock Exchange, helping investors make informed decisions and maximize returns.

landReclamation.title: Land Reclamation
landReclamation.description: Transforming barren land into productive agricultural assets through innovative reclamation projects, contributing to food security and sustainable development.

securitiesTrading.title: Securities Trading
securitiesTrading.description: Offering secure and efficient securities trading services with professional support, enabling investors to build diversified portfolios and achieve financial goals.

goldInvestment.title: Gold Investment
goldInvestment.description: Facilitating safe and profitable gold investment opportunities, providing a hedge against inflation and a pathway to wealth preservation and growth.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are committed to providing strong and sustainable investment opportunities in key sectors such as industry, agriculture, real estate, and financial markets. Through specialized training programs, we empower individuals and entrepreneurs with the skills and knowledge needed to seize opportunities and drive growth.

hero.title: Our Companies
hero.subtitle: Our Group of Companies and Their Investment Sectors

intro.title: A number of companies operating across various sectors
intro.description: Honest Egy Group consists of three companies operating in different sectors: Honest Homes, specialized in real estate investment; Finance Broker, also in the real estate field; and HR Academy, focused on training and professional development.

hfb.name: Honest Financial Brokerage
hfb.description1: At Honest Financial Brokerage, we are committed to providing a secure, efficient, and reliable trading environment that meets the evolving needs of our clients — driven by our dedication to innovation and transparency.
hfb.description2: We have established ourselves as the preferred choice for securities trading in the United Arab Emirates, offering our investors financial solutions focused on growth and sustainability.
hfb.summary: This message highlights Honest Financial Brokerage's commitment to delivering a trusted and safe trading environment. It emphasizes the company's innovation and transparency in service delivery, positioning it as a leading choice for securities trading in the UAE. The statement also underlines the company's focus on offering financial solutions that foster sustainable growth for its investors

hh.name: HONEST HOMES
hh.description: Honest Homes Egypt is a real estate company focused on providing reliable and transparent property solutions. The company emphasizes integrity, professionalism, and customer satisfaction in helping clients buy, sell, or lease properties across Egypt.
hh.missionText: To deliver honest and trustworthy real estate services with a customer-first approach.
hh.servicesText: Property sales, rentals, and investment opportunities in Egypt.
hh.teamText: A group of experienced professionals dedicated to guiding clients throughout the real estate investment process.
hh.closing: The company aims to stand out in the market by prioritizing ethical business practices and building long-term relationships with its clients

hr.name: HR ACADEMY
hr.description: We equip individuals and organizations with the knowledge and practical skills in business, trading, marketing, and technology — empowering them to achieve lasting success in a fast-changing world.

imageUpload.title: Upload Your Image
imageUpload.important: Important: Your photo must be CLEAR for verification
imageUpload.rule1: Blurry or low-quality images will be rejected
imageUpload.rule2: Your face must be clearly visible and recognizable
